item.description:
While all the shoppers rush out to start their holiday shopping, we will relax at CHUNKY'S CINEMA PUB. For those of you who are not familiar with this landmark, it is a combination movie theater and restaurant. The seating is table style instead of rows and the seats are recliners from old fashioned cars.

The plan is to meet for the matinee showing of SKY FALL.Â  The movie starts at 11:45 am so we will meet in the lobby at 10:45 am and go into the theater at 11:00 am so that our lunch or snack arrives just as the film starts.

Anyone that is interested in hanging out afterwards is welcome to make suggestions for "Part Two!" of our after Thanksgiving celebration.

You can check out the menu and look for movies at http://www.chunkys.com/showtimes/pelham/?loc=Pelham
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in the lobby. I will have a meetup sign.

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: CHUNKY'S in Pelham
